## R Markdown

These slides show an exploratory analysis made on the cars data set. It contains 

- Data Overview
- MPG and HP per number of Cylinders
- Time to reach 1/4 mile compared to car weight
- MPG compared to car weigth

## Data Overview

```{r , echo = FALSE}
head(mtcars,10)
```

## MPG and HP per number of Cylinders
```{r cars, echo = FALSE}
mtcars$cyl <- as.factor(mtcars$cyl)
```

```{r pressure, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
hpplot<-plot_ly(mtcars, x= ~cyl, y = ~hp, type = "box", color = ~cyl)
mpgplot<-plot_ly(mtcars, x= ~cyl, y = ~mpg, type = "box", color = ~cyl)
subplot(hpplot, mpgplot)
```

## Time to reach 1/4 mile compared to car weigth 

```{r , message=FALSE}
plot_ly(mtcars, x= ~wt, y = ~qsec, type = "scatter", color = ~cyl)

```

## MPG compared to car weigth 

```{r , message=FALSE}
plot_ly(mtcars, x= ~wt, y = ~mpg, type = "scatter", color = ~cyl)

```
